scripts.db:dev: npx sequelize-cli db:drop && npx sequelize-cli db:create && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate && npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all
scripts.db:test: npx sequelize-cli --env=test db:drop && npx sequelize-cli --env=test db:create && npx sequelize-cli --env=test db:migrate && npx sequelize-cli --env=test db:seed:all
scripts.reset-run: npx sequelize db:migrate:undo:all && npx sequelize db:migrate && npx sequelize db:seed:all && nodemon app.js
